<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// GetMainExecutable - Return the path to the main executable, given the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a057a733b2dfa2f0531ceb335cf3b1d03">getMainExecutable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;argv0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MainAddr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#95;NSGetExecutablePath(exe&#95;path, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>) == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (getprogpath(exe&#95;path, argv0) != NULL)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Null terminate the string for realpath. readlink never null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminates its output.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    len = std::min(len, ssize&#95;t(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(exe&#95;path) - 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    exe&#95;path&#91;len&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\0&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On Linux, /proc/self/exe always looks through symlinks. However, on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GNU/Hurd, /proc/self/exe is a symlink to the path that was used to start</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the program, and not the eventual binary file. Therefore, call realpath</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> file&#95;type direntType(dirent &#42;Entry) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Most platforms provide the file type in the dirent: Linux/BSD/Mac.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The DTTOIF macro lets us reuse our status -&gt; type conversion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that while glibc provides a macro to see if this is supported,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;DIRENT&#95;HAVE&#95;D&#95;TYPE, it&#39;s not defined on BSD/Mac, so we test for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// d&#95;type-to-mode&#95;t conversion macro instead.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> typeForMode(DTTOIF(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff/#ae7629a0652411dc2be61aea4fee2b39caadd024eaaab0666500593f30456bbc43">Entry</a>-&gt;d&#95;type));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Other platforms such as Solaris require a stat() to get the type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> file&#95;type::type&#95;unknown;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Call ::open in a lambda to avoid overload resolution in RetryAfterSignal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when open is overloaded, such as in Bionic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Open = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123; return ::open(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.begin(), OpenFlags, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocevictionadvisor-cpp/#aef71c4b21823f236e70cc6d62375adcd">Mode</a>); &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((ResultFD = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a137eaaa673e8fbf6bd1bfc41ea0c12b5">sys::RetryAfterSignal</a>(-1, Open)) &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef O&#95;CLOEXEC</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(Flags &amp; OF&#95;ChildInherit)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> r = fcntl(ResultFD, F&#95;SETFD, FD&#95;CLOEXEC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)r;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(r == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;fcntl(F&#95;SETFD, FD&#95;CLOEXEC) failed&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef &#95;&#95;MVS&#95;&#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; Reason about auto-conversion and file tags. Setting the file tag only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; applies if file is opened in write mode:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Text file:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  File exists       File created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;CreateNew     n/a               conv: on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                                    tag: set 1047</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;CreateAlways  conv: auto        conv: on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  tag: auto 1047    tag: set 1047</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;OpenAlways    conv: auto        conv: on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  tag: auto 1047    tag: set 1047</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;OpenExisting  conv: auto        n/a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  tag: unchanged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Binary file:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  File exists       File created</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;CreateNew     n/a               conv: off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                                    tag: set binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;CreateAlways  conv: off         conv: off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  tag: auto binary  tag: set binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;OpenAlways    conv: off         conv: off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  tag: auto binary  tag: set binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; CD&#95;OpenExisting  conv: off         n/a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;                  tag: unchanged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Actions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   conv: off        -&gt; auto-conversion is turned off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   conv: on         -&gt; auto-conversion is turned on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   conv: auto       -&gt; auto-conversion is turned on if the file is untagged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   tag: set 1047    -&gt; set the file tag to text encoded in 1047</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   tag: set binary  -&gt; set the file tag to binary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   tag: auto 1047   -&gt; set file tag to 1047 if not set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   tag: auto binary -&gt; set file tag to binary if not set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   tag: unchanged   -&gt; do not care about the file tag</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; It is not possible to distinguish between the cases &quot;file exists&quot; and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; &quot;file created&quot;. In the latter case, the file tag is not set and the file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; size is zero. The decision table boils down to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; the file tag is set if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   - the file is opened for writing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   - the create disposition is not equal to CD&#95;OpenExisting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   - the file tag is not set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;   - the file size is zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; This only applies if the file is a regular file. E.g. enabling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; auto-conversion for reading from /dev/null results in error EINVAL when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; calling read().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; Using append mode with z/OS UTF-8 auto-conversion results in EINVAL when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; calling write(). Instead we need to use lseek() to set offset to EOF after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42; open().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">   &#42;/</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Flags &amp; OF&#95;Append) &amp;&amp; lseek(ResultFD, 0, SEEK&#95;END) == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">stat Stat;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (fstat(ResultFD, &amp;Stat) == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (S&#95;ISREG(Stat.st&#95;mode)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DoSetTag = (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/directx/dxilresourceaccess-cpp/#adb4fa2b9065093d32736f78ea43a8c8a">Access</a> &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a5be5c24e530c666de488a0ed47e086efac6140a2ec08f1a1b4ae30ba3cbacb655">FA&#95;Write</a>) &amp;&amp; (Disp != CD&#95;OpenExisting) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    !Stat.st&#95;tag.ft&#95;txtflag &amp;&amp; !Stat.st&#95;tag.ft&#95;ccsid &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Flags &amp; OF&#95;Text) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs">fs</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef &#95;&#95;APPLE&#95;&#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This implementation tries to perform an APFS CoW clone of the file,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which can be much faster and uses less space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Unfortunately fcopyfile(3) does not support COPYFILE&#95;CLONE, so the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// file descriptor variant of this function still uses the default</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::error&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#abe768b38d21bfc2bc91a1c1d09cd84de">copy&#95;file</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Twine &amp;From, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Twine &amp;To) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string FromS = From.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#a4c1c1093a7749409c70838678514cc7c">str</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string ToS = To.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#a4c1c1093a7749409c70838678514cc7c">str</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if &#95;&#95;has&#95;builtin(&#95;&#95;builtin&#95;available)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#95;&#95;builtin&#95;available(macos 10.12, &#42;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Optimistically try to use clonefile() and handle errors, rather than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calling stat() to see if it&#39;ll work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: It&#39;s okay if From is a symlink. In contrast to the behaviour of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// copyfile() with COPYFILE&#95;CLONE, clonefile() clones targets (not the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// symlink itself) unless the flag CLONE&#95;NOFOLLOW is passed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!clonefile(FromS.c&#95;str(), ToS.c&#95;str(), 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Errno = errno;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Errno) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EEXIST:  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To already exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ENOTSUP: </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Device does not support cloning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EXDEV:   </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From and To are on different devices.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Anything else will also break copyfile().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code(Errno, std::generic&#95;category());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: For EEXIST, profile calling fs::generateUniqueName() and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clonefile() in a retry loop (then rename() on success) before falling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// back to copyfile(). Depending on the size of the file this could be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cheaper.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!copyfile(FromS.c&#95;str(), ToS.c&#95;str(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;State=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">NULL, COPYFILE&#95;DATA))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::error&#95;code();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae075c94db10b09d6d5876d32219eaf0d">errnoAsErrorCode</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
